venue.address_2: Suite 188 - at the end of the pier
venue.name: Fenway Bark

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at FENWAY BARK!

Come play from 10am - 12pm and get 20% off all services and products during that time. Parking is free and there's plenty of it.

From Fenway Bark: For the safety of all our guests, we require that all dogs who use our indoor lawns to have all our  health requirements met - documentation showing up to date vaccinations and a negative fecal float in the past 6 months. Dogs attending must have up-to-date rabies vaccinations. Veterinary records can be faxed to Fenway Bark at 617-507-8271 in advance of the meetup. Intact dogs need to be kept on a non retractable leash for the safety of all guests.

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: September French Bulldog Meetup
